Class ZlmApiController

java.lang.Object
io.github.lunasaw.zlm.api.controller.ZlmApiController
@RestController @ConditionalOnProperty(value="zlm.enable", havingValue="true") @RequestMapping("/zlm/api") public class ZlmApiController extends Object
